summary: The diff implements dark color styling for the logout button in both LoginButton.tsx and Header.tsx components. The LoginButton component now uses 'bg-gray-900 hover:bg-gray-800 text-white border-2 border-gray-700' for the logout state, providing strong contrast. The Header.tsx file was also modified (though truncated), indicating changes to desktop nav logout styling. The requirement to apply consistent styling across both desktop and mobile nav layouts is partially verifiable due to truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Dark color styling applied consistently on both desktop and mobile views in the Header component
missing_requirements.reason: The Header.tsx diff is truncated and only shows the desktop nav section partially. The mobile nav logout button styling cannot be confirmed from the available diff. While changes were made to Header.tsx, the mobile menu logout button code is not visible in the truncated output.
